channel.title: Cursors not showing

item.title: Cursors not showing
item.dc:creator: @TheTutMan TheTutMan
item.description:
@TheTutMan wrote:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/235663-sigex-custom-cursors.html

so i was adding some cursors using the link above and i used this pice of code Toolkit toolkit = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit(); Cursor cursor = toolkit.createCustomCursor(toolkit.getImage("Cursor 0.PNG"), new Point(0,0), "Cursor 0"); setCursor(cursor);

and i added the sprite to the sprite foulder but the cursor is still not showing

eneyone help plz

Read full topic
